summary: The IDeA Reauthorization Act of 2025 seeks to improve the Institutional Development Award (IDeA) program of the National Institutes of Health (NIH). The bill amends the Public Health Service Act to specify the program's name, clarify the criteria for eligible entities (IDeA States), and mandate that the NIH provide Congress with detailed reports on the program's strategy, awards, and achievements, including integration efforts, reviewer representation, and gains in research quality and human resource development.
